attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to say how I think that the school timings for secondary schools should be timed differant, it should be from 12pm to 6 pm. I have several reasons why I think this.

- Children are too tired in the morning to have to work to the best of their ability.

- Children will be more awake and ready for the school day.

- Parents could pick there children up from school after they have finished work, so then children that dont have a oyster card wont have to pay £2.

Please take this petition seriously, and reply as soon as posiible

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
